name: MyO Receipts
slogan: Customer engagement platform for retail and hospitality sectors, reinventing receipts
description: MyO is a digital receipts and customer engagement platform for retailers. MyO allows customers to seamlessly receive interactive itemised, digital receipts in real time, directly to their phone, with no additional steps. The platform creates a unique, direct channel of communication between merchants and customers, giving retailers the opportunity to alert current and potential customers about offers, news, and loyalty rewards. Our goal is to give customers control of their receipts data and help retailers engage customers through eliminating paper receipts.

team.name: Alessandra Bovina
team.bioHtml: Founder @MyO Receipts • Worked at @UniCredit Investment Banking, @Mediobanca

jobs.title: Partnerships Manager - also Advisor/Non-Executive Director role
jobs.description:
About us: 
MYO is a software that allows individual customers to receive, collect and store receipts in a seamless and real-time way, enabling the merchants to benefit from an incredible amount of anonymous data at the same time. MYO places itself in the new technological era and aims to become a mean for environmental causes such as paper waste, helping to shape the generations of the future. Relying on a cutting-edge technology built ad-hoc by its knowledgeable development team, MYO replaces and foster what we think is the most important part of the buying process: when you leave. Making things easier and more enjoyable from both the customer and the merchant’s perspective, MYO creates a new mean for digital receipts and customer engagement.

The role: 
As Partnership Manager you will be involved in the strategic planning and development of the sales channel for B2B merchants in the retail and hospitality space. You will be in charge of connecting and creating relationships with restaurant/shops/cafe SMEs and chains.

You have:
-Experience in B2B sales (B2B2C ideal)
-Contacts in the hospitality/retail sector in London
-Proven successful partnership   


If this sounds like you please apply and, if successful, you’ll be contacted for a round of interviews.

We can’t wait to have you on-board!




MYO Team
